SUB_W08_WRLD_DIVA_START_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_WRLD_DIVA_START_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Judging by my analysis, I appear to be
underground—and there also seems
to be loads of life in this area.

SUB_W08_WRLD_DIVA_START_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Constantine
SUB_W08_WRLD_DIVA_START_000_CUT_000_010.text:
How nice to hear; you'll never be able to
recover your heart if you can't interact
with other living beings, after all! But that said, I haven't the faintest idea
how we're going to get around this place;
I'd rather not scrabble about in the dirt
unless I have literally no other option.

SUB_W08_WRLD_DIVA_START_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_WRLD_DIVA_START_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Then I suppose I'll have to do a wee
spot of digging instead, for no price
is too large to get my heart back!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: I'm detecting something at my feet.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
It's a worm—though much bigger
than any I've ever seen.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Stay away from that worm, you!
It's mine!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Good day to ye, love.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Don't recognize you, stranger.
Where are you from?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Ye came from further underground.
Are ye a mole, perhaps?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
What does it matter what I am?
Just gimme the worm.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Moles eat worms, as I recall,
so ye can go ahead and take it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: You sure? I mean, really sure? Worm this big is a pretty rare find.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Aye, it means nothing to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Yesss! Now I can finally go home!
You're good people, stranger. Take care.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Wait! I'm searching for my heart.
Do ye know where I might find it?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Nope—but good luck all the same.
Bye now!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Wait!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: What is it this time?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Might ye take me to wherever ye are
headed? I cannae dig so well, ye see.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Wait. You can't dig holes?
How have you LIVED, man!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Poorly, it seems.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Fine, whatever. I'll take you to my home.
You're on your own from there, though!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Thank ye! Oh, and my name's Diva.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: I'm Tope, of the Kuld.

SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
I cannae believe how fast ye dug
that hole, love! It's brilliant!

SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
The trick is to look for spots
where the earth is soft.

SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
But if ye and your people get around
by digging, don't ye already have a
whole network of tunnels?

SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Nope. Our tunnels eventually cave in
and fill up all on their own.

SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
When the earth gets dug up and filled in,
it makes the soil more fertile. That fertile
soil goes on to nurture nutrient-rich worms,
which all of us then chow down on.

SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
That's how the circle of life goes
in this world, then? Fascinating.

SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, I dunno about that.
All I know is that we couldn't get
by if we didn't do it this way.

SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Crummy thing is that worms have been real
hard to come by lately—but that's a tale
for another time. Now let's go home.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Here's the colony where
we Kuld live.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
How many of your friends
live here with ye, then?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Friends? Haven't got any. The Kuld believe in
acting alone—only live with others because it
makes it easier for us to stay safe. I don't
even know how many of us live here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
C'mon, let's go to my house.
It's over there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Coste! I'm home!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Late again, Tope! Ground below, how long
does it take to catch one measly worm!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Mommy! I'm hungry!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: I know, honey. I know.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
See that? Your poor son is starving!
Now hand over the worms already.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Here you go, honeybunch.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Are you KIDDING me!? This is it?
Well, that's just pathetic.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Sorry, sweetie, but you know how poor
the hunting's been lately, and—

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I don't want to hear your excuses!
How pathetic.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I thought ye said ye didn't
have any friends?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I don't. This is family.
Family's different.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, a guest! Well, this is unusual.
Why didn't you tell me you were bringing
someone home, you grubhead!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
This is Diva, honeyclaws.
She gave me the worm.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
This is my wife, Coste,
and my son, Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Chuffed to meet ye both!
Hope I'm not intruding.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I'm sorry you had to see such a disgraceful
display, stranger. We don't have much,
but please make yourself at home.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: And as for you, Tope...

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Yes, sweetlips?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
You're an idiot if you think this single
worm is enough for us! Little Gourmand
here is a growing pup, you know!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Mommy! When's fooooood!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Of course, honey. I'll be right back.
Just hold on, all right, Son?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Ye said it's been hard to
catch worms lately, aye?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Yeah, it's like their population dried
up all of a sudden. And it's not just
worms—other creatures too.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Do ye know why?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Nope, but I'm looking into it—because if
this continues, we're all gonna starve.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Have ye not told Coste of this?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
The last thing I want to do is cause
Coste any unnecessary worry.
Nope, this is something where I just
have to carry my own water.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, I'm gonna get back to looking 
into what's going on, like I said.
What are you gonna do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I want to go with ye; whatever's causing
the worms to vanish might have something
to do with my lost heart.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, today I'm goin' farther than usual,
so we might end up runnin' into other species.
Sure you're ready for that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: There are other species here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
A few, yeah—though we don't usually
interact, so I can't tell you much more. This world's got a kind of code, see:
stick to your own, avoid unnecessary spats,
and you'll generally be golden.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
One of the Bashar might be
at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Hey! Get outta here, you!
This is Kuld territory!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Stop yelling, you silly mole!
What do you want?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Oh, Coste! What a relief!
Where were you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
We both got bored waiting for you
to come home, so we took a little
walk to kill some time.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
I'm sorry, honeypants, but it's not safe out
here right now. In fact, you should just stay
away from the colony altogether for a bit.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Don't need to tell me twice—just make
sure you come home with some good
worms this time. You hear me?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Yes, thanks to you. Also, you're one
of the Kuld that live here, right?
Tope, I think?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
That's me, all right. But tell me,
have you seen a mole named Coste?
She's my wife.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Coste? Sure did! Said she was worried
and headed out to try and find you.
A real firecracker, that one!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Well, at least she's not here.
That's a relief.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Do ye know anything about the
Bashar who attacked ye?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Nope. All I know is they came
after me outta nowhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_00.text: One of the Naml might be at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_01.text:
Do ye know anything about the
Naml who attacked ye?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_00.text:
One of the Dufda might be
at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.text:
You're not making this easy!
Whatever. Forget this.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.text:
Do ye know anything about the
Dufda who attacked ye?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text:
This is the only colony we've yet to visit.
Surely the Lord of the Earth will be here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text: This is my house, and I will protect it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text:
The ground is shaking...
It's coming!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text: It's not moving... Is it over?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
It's completely destroyed. I'm so sorry.
Shame I lack the ability to repair robots,
because it cannae purify the earth now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
No, it's better this way; I actually hate the
thought of relying on something called
the 'Lord of the Earth' to survive.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Are you any further along in finding
that missing heart, by the way?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Nae, I still haven't a clue
where to even look for it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Eh, try not to let it get you down too much.
As for us, we'll do all we can to fill our world
with juicy worms again without relying on
any 'Lord of the Earth.'

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Tope! Where in the WORLD
have you been!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Coste? Gourmand? I'm gonna do it.
I'M GONNA DOOOOO IT!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Oh for the love of dirt... Maybe stop all
this fool yelling and go get us some worms,
you good-for-nothing mole!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: ERRORS REPAIRED. RESTARTING.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: System abnormality repaired!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: ALL SYSTEMS GREEN. SOIL CONTAMINATION DETECTED. INITIATING CLEANUP PROCESS.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Huh? It left.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Oh, but we did it, love!
It's going to purify the earth!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Then we did it?
We saved the world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Nae, I'm afraid not. I still haven't
a clue where to even look for it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
That's a shame, but try not to let it
get you down, hey? I'm sure everything
will work out in the end.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Thanks for the support, love.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
And thanks to you for everything!
Be safe out there, Diva.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Coste! Gourmand! I did it!
I saved the world!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
I'm bored of worms, Mommy!
I wanna eat something TASTY!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: WHAAAAAAT!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
...And that's why I need you to
take my son with you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Are ye sure that's wise, love?
I'm on a most perilous journey.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
All children need to leave the burrow
sometime, and I know you'll take very
good care of our little Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Yaaay! I can't wait to eat
all of the tasties!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Well, if ye feel sure about this...

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
We'll rest easy knowing our son
is with you, Diva. Now don't make any trouble, Son.
You do everything she says, all right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Have fun, Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Yaaaaaay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text:
So was that really the Lord of the Earth?
I mean, it could have just been one of the
carnivorous mushrooms the Naml use, right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text:
I don't know. Maybe the tales of it
purifying the earth were all lies?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text: Well, even if it was cleaning it up, I don't want to live in a world where I'm worried about being eaten alive by some gigantic mushroom.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Perhaps the Naml always knew of this.
That would explain why they were so
opposed to releasing it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
I see. Either way, try not to let it get you
down. Heck, you solved the Naml's problem
AND got to go on a tour of this world!
Seems like a pretty good journey, all in all.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Aye, you're right. And if not for
your help, I wouldn't have been
able to search for my heart.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Ha ha ha! I did it!
I saved the world!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text:
This has to be some bad Dufda
joke that went a little too far.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text:
Was that really the Lord of the Earth?
I cannae be sure...

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text: Well, even if it was cleaning up the earth, I don't want to live in a world where I'm worried about that thing swallowing me whole.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.text:
It purified the earth for us.
I'm chuffed I could help after all.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.text:
Yeah, I suppose it might've actually
been the Lord of the Earth... You know what? I'm gonna say it was.
Heck, it renewed our soil, after all!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the origin of that
big quake earlier.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Be careful, love. I'm receiving
a rather high energy reading.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_000.text:
So the Lord of the Earth is actually
a machine that improves the soil.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_040.text: UNABLE TO BOOT NORMALLY. SWITCHING TO START/STOP PROCESS.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Poor thing is malfunctioning and
unable to start up properly.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_070.text: ERROR. ERROR. ERROR. UNABLE TO EXECUTE START/STOP PROCESS. NORMAL OPERATIONS NOT GUARANTEED.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_080.text: TERRAFORMING PROCESS DEEMED A FAILURE. BEGINNING RESET OF WORLD ENVIRONMENT. ALERT. ALERT. THIS PROCESS IS DANGEROUS. OPERATORS MUST TAKE SHELTER IMMEDIATELY.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_010.text: Oh, but this is a proper mess!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_030.text:
It's gone mad! If we don't stop it,
it will destroy the world—and us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_050.text:
Well, as living creatures have more effect
on the environment than anything else,
it's likely making for one of the colonies.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_000.text:
Is this really the Lord of the Earth?
I expected it to be larger.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_010.text:
There's something off about these bugs.
Their eyes are...dull.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
Aye, but nothing else about them seems amiss.
So please start the purification process if ye would,
Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_000.text:
I've got an awful feeling about this.
We should look around the colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_010.text:
I don't have senses like yours, but I cannae
see anything out of the ordinary in the area.
I think we will be fine, which means it's
time to go search for my heart.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_020.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_020.text:
Oh, right. I forgot that's the
whole reason you came here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_000.text: Is this really the Lord of the Earth?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_010.text: Will it listen to us, then?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_020.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_020.text:
I don't think it's happy
about being woken up.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_030.text: The Dufda were right. It's useless.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_010.text:
It looks less enraged and
more just upset as anything.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_020.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_020.text:
Maybe it's hungry because
it's been hibernating?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_030.text:
What does the Lord of the Earth
even eat, though?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_040.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_040.text:
I was hoping the answer wasn't us,
but I think it's about to chow down
on everything in the colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Is the Lord of the Earth going
to attack this place!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I calculate a 95% probability
of that happening, aye.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Since it can't take control of this colony,
I imagine it's on its way to another.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Well, at least we kept
this one safe for now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_020_.text:
It's probably going to attack one of the
other colonies. We need to get after it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.text:
Is the Lord of the Earth going
to attack this place!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.text:
I calculate a 30% probability
of that happening, aye.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_040_.text:
Seems this wasn't its target
after all, then.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Do you think you'll find that
missing heart of yours here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text:
The ground's shaking! Er, is that
something your heart can do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I don't know; I'm not even
entirely sure what one is.

SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_000.text:
There was a worm in that
mountain of earth.

SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, sometimes you find goodies when you dig
holes. At first you might think that something's
gotten in your way, but worms often hide out
in places like that, so I personally welcome it.

SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Considering we found one already,
I'm guessing you may just be my
lucky charm, Diva!

SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_GIMK_DIVA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_040.text: Nae, I have no such power.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text: What are the Bashar like, then?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
Primitive and violent to the very last.
Nothing good ever comes of dealing with
them, but let's hope this ends up being
the exception that proves the rule. Anyway, there's gotta be a clue here,
so let's get to looking.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
The worms are gone.
The Creator is angry.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
We do not have enough offerings.
I will find an offering for the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
I'm afraid I cannae detect the
presence of any such higher being.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text: Likely because they made it up.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
They are strong. So strong.
We cannot give them as offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
I will search for an offering.
I will search elsewhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
They mentioned searching for
an offering elsewhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
Offerings... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: You return. What do you want?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about this, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The earth is dirty now.
The earth is bad.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The earth's life is the world's life.
It is hopeless.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: So there's nothing we can do!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Aye, is there no way to rid the
soil of impurities, then?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
We pray to the Creator.
We pray every day.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Prayer changes nothing, love.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
There is one way.
But it will anger the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Then tell me; I'll do anything
in my power to help, I will.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
No. The Creator hates the weak.
We must test your strength.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Do we meet your standards, then?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
You are strong. The Creator likes you.
We can tell you now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Then please get to it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Wake up the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth?
Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth eats foul dirt.
The Lord of the Earth makes clean dirt.
The Lord of the Earth serves the Creator.
The Lord of the Earth made the world with the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth is asleep.
It has been sleeping long and long.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
So if we wake the Lord of the Earth,
it will purify the soil for us?
Aye, we can do that.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Yes. But it is dangerous.
The Lord of the Earth is violent.
The Lord of the Earth listens only to the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
It is bad to wake it up
of your own will.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: I'm not sure what to do here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
What happened to all that confidence
from earlier, huh!? We gonna be fine
so long as we stick together!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
But where will we find this Lord of the Earth,
though? It seems to be somewhere my sensors
aren't able to penetrate.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Remove the keystones. There are two.
This will wake the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: And where are they?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
There and there. One in each place.
They are big stones. With pictures.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Aye, we'll have a look about.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
They are extremely prolific—by which
I mean there's a heck of a lot of 'em. They're not hostile, exactly, but they sure
ain't friendly either. I wouldn't be here if
I didn't have to be, so let's start looking
for clues.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
The colony's food reserves are low.
We must go harvesting.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
We are going to procure
some of them right now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
Why are we discussing farming
all of a sudden?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
I found the perfect seedbeds
right here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: We cannot use them as seedbeds.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
It sounded like they're off to
search for seedbeds elsewhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
Seedbeds... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Honestly, I don't know 'em very well—
rarely even seen 'em, in fact. All I
know is I wanna find a clue and get
out of here as quick as we can.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Why don't we go to the toys?
We could play with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Oooh, that could be fun.
But we need feed for the toys.
Let's go find some.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
What are these toys they're
talking about, then?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
You cannae eat us, loves!
We lack nutritional value!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text: They are not good for feed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
Boo! Killjoys! Boo!
Let's look somewhere else.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
It sounded like they're off to
search for feed elsewhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
Feed... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text:
The Bashar are gathering their victims.
What are they planning here, then?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text:
We've brought our offerings, O Creator!
Feast well! Feast well!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text: We were unable to gather offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text: Then you will be our offering.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
Ach! The people they gathered
turned into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
You saw our ceremony. This is bad.
We must kill everyone who saw.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text: That Bashar turned into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
The Creator created this world.
The Creator gives us worms.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
But the Creator has been angry lately.
So we must give offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
Offerings? Those are just a bunch of
carnivorous mushrooms, you dirtbags!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text: Do not go against the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
And we've not even enough information to
make an educated guess. What should we do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
Much as I hate to say it, we won't find the
answers we need among the Kuld; we have
to venture out and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
The Naml are gathering their victims.
What are they planning here, then?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
You will become seedbeds.
Seedbeds for our food.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
Sadly, we met with an obstacle and
were unable to secure our seedbeds.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
This responsibility lies with you.
You will be our seedbed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
Ach! The people they gathered
turned into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
You have learned the secret to our
food supply. This cannot stand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text: That Naml turned into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
Securing our food. These mushrooms
create an infinite supply of seedbeds
from other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
These mushrooms will allow us
to live forever.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text: You're sacrificing people!? What a sick joke!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
And we've not even enough information to
make an educated guess. What should we do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
Much as I hate to say it, we won't find the
answers we need among the Kuld; we have
to venture out and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
The Dufda are gathering their victims.
What are they planning here, then?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
Hooray for all of you!
You get to be feed for our toys!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
Sorryyy! Stuff came up and
I couldn't bring anyone.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
Ach! The people they gathered
turned into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
You saw our toys, didn't you?
We cannot allow this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text: That Dufda turned into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
These mushrooms are our toys.
Aren't they cool?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
They turn regular people into mushroom
people. Isn't that awesome?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
Stop playing with lives,
you pimply tadpoles!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
That's manure and you know it!
This world is eat or be eaten!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
And we've not even enough information to
make an educated guess. What should we do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
Much as I hate to say it, we won't find the
answers we need among the Kuld; we have
to venture out and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
This is the Naml colony. They're extremely
prolific—by which I mean there's a heck
of a lot of 'em. Not hostile, exactly,
but they sure ain't friendly either.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I hope we can glean some information.
Do ye think we'll find the Bashar here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Don't know—and don't really care what
happens to the Naml, if I'm honest.
But we need leads, so let's get in there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Bashar! What do you want, you scoundrel?
Step any closer and you will pay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: An offering! An offering!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: What are you doing!? Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: They're being attacked!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Best to wait and watch.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: I'll save ye!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: They've been taken away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Are you here to attack us?
I will not hold back if you are.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Leave now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Wait. Ye wouldn't happen to know anything
about my heart, would... Nae, I suppose not.
Apologies for the trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Foiled again. They are strong.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Are ye all right there?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: How pitiful to be saved by a Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
That's how you act when someone saves
your hide? See if I help you again!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I did not ask for your help.
You did this without permission.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I apologize for meddling in your affairs.
Ye wouldn't happen to know why people
cannae catch worms anymore, would ye?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Go away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
We won't be getting anything out of
this guy. Let's go somewhere else.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
This is the Naml colony. They're extremely
prolific—by which I mean there's a heck
of a lot of 'em. Not hostile, exactly,
but they sure ain't friendly either.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I hope we can glean some information.
Do ye think we'll find the Dufda here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Don't know—and don't really care what
happens to the Naml, if I'm honest.
But we need leads, so let's get in there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
What does a Dufda want from this place?
Step any closer and you will pay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Found feed! Found feed!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: What are you doing!? Stop!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: They're being attacked!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Best to wait and watch.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: I'll save ye!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: They've been taken away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Are you here to attack us?
I will not hold back if you are.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Leave now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Wait. Ye wouldn't happen to know anything
about my heart, would... Nae, I suppose not.
Apologies for the trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Uuugh. Fiiine.
Forget this.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Are ye all right there?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: How pitiful to be saved by a Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
That's how you act when someone saves
your hide? See if I help you again!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I didn't ask for your help!
You just went ahead and gave it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I apologize for meddling in your affairs.
Ye wouldn't happen to know why people
cannae catch worms anymore, would ye?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
We won't be getting anything out of
this guy. Let's go somewhere else.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
I told you, I have nothing to say.
Now begone from this place.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about the cause, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
There is no cause. The clean earth has
merely become sullied over the passing
of many, many years.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
That is what earth is. The coming end
of the earth's life span means the world's
end is upon us as well. This is our fate.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: So we can't do anything to fix it?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Aye, is there no way to rid the
soil of impurities, then?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
We Naml have prepared for this situation by
building up our food stores for a long time.
Even if there are no more worms to capture,
we will endure.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Well, it's definitely important to be
ready for anything, but is there really
no other way to deal with this?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
You are sharp. You are clever. Yes, there is a way—but it comes with
great risk. So instead of engaging with
that risk, we chose a more definitive way
of extending our life span.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
So you don't care if everyone else dies
as long as the Naml are all right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Yet we are not the only ones doing so.
No, your words are not something
I care to hear from a selfish Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Please tell us what ye know;
I want to help however I can.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: Hold on! I never agreed to this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
But I must do it—even on my own if
needs be—for it may lead to my heart.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: Oh, fine. I'll help.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
This is not something we can leave
to the weak. So before I tell you,
I must test your strength.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: Did we pass your test, then?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Well done. I suppose it is safe
to leave this in your hands.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: So what do we do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
You must wake the
Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: The Lord of the Earth? Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
In the beginning, this world was naught but
sullied soil. But the Lord of the Earth
purified the land, creating the chance for
life to blossom.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Once it was finished, it is said the
Lord of the Earth slipped into a
long slumber in a place unknown.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
So if we wake the Lord of the Earth,
it will purify the soil for us?
Aye, we can do that.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Even if you manage to rouse the Lord of the Earth,
it does not mean it will purify the earth as we
hope. Indeed, it may go beyond purification and
end up destroying the entire world.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Do you understand the risk that comes with
waking a being that has the power to remake
the world completely?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: I don't know what to do, love.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
What happened to all that confidence
from earlier, huh!? We gonna be fine
so long as we stick together!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
But where will we find this Lord of the Earth,
though? It seems to be somewhere my sensors
aren't able to penetrate.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
I know not where it is, but legends claim the
Lord of the Earth is held in slumber by two
keystones of opposing powers. If you move
them, it might cause the Lord to awaken.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: So where are they?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Each stone rests not far from this colony.
Look for enormous rocks carved with reliefs
of creatures unknown.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: Aye, we'll see what we can find.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
This is the Dufda colony. Honestly,
I don't know 'em very well—rarely
ever seen 'em, in fact.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text: Will we find the Bashar here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
Ew! Get out of here, Bashar!
You're gross!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
You're one of the Bashar's friends,
aren't you!? Go away! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
Wait. Ye wouldn't happen to know anything
about my heart, would... Nae, I suppose not.
Apologies for the trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
You saved me! Thank youuu!
So, uh, what did you need again?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
Ye wouldn't happen to know why people
cannae catch worms anymore, would ye?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
Hmm... I might know,
but I also might not!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
This is the Dufda colony. Honestly,
I don't know 'em very well—rarely
ever seen 'em, in fact.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text: Will we find the Naml here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
I have found a seedbed.
Time to secure it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
You're one of the Naml's friends,
aren't you!? Go away! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
Wait. Ye wouldn't happen to know anything
about my heart, would... Nae, I suppose not.
Apologies for the trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
An interference.
We must retreat for now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
You saved me! Thank youuu!
So, uh, what did you need again?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
Ye wouldn't happen to know why people
cannae catch worms anymore, would ye?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
Hmm... I might know,
but I also might not!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about the cause, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Nothing's causing it!
The soil is just dirty now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
It's the end of the earth's life,
which means it's the end of the world's
life—and you can't do much about that!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text: So we can't do anything to fix it?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Aye, is there no way to rid the
soil of impurities, then?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
We Dufda take the days as they come.
Now we'll just have fun until the end!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
But the other races here are in peril.
Is there no way we can help them?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
You're an interesting one, aren't you?
But sure, there's a way—I just don't
care about it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Then at least share it
with us so I can help.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Fiiine, I'll tell you...
AFTER you play with me!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Wee hee hee! What fun!
So fine, I'll tell you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
You have to wake up the
Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text: The Lord of the Earth? Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Some weirdo who eats the dirty earth and
makes it all clean. I heard he cleaned the
whole world once back when it was all filthy.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
So if we wake the Lord of the Earth,
it will purify the soil for us?
Aye, we can do that.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Yeah, except I don't think he's
really gonna listen to you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
In fact, he'll probably get all mad
that you woke him and go hog wild!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text: I don't know what to do, love.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
What happened to all that confidence
from earlier, huh!? We gonna be fine
so long as we stick together!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
But where will we find this Lord of the Earth,
though? It seems to be somewhere my sensors
aren't able to penetrate.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Dunno! Oh, but I hear it's snoozing 'cause
of two keystones with opposing powers?
So you probably wanna try moving those.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
There's one in one place, and another in...
Ummmm... Some other place. They're big rocks
with carvings of weird creatures on 'em.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text: Aye, we'll see what we can find.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
That's the Bashar colony—a people primitive
and violent to the last. Nothing good ever
comes of dealing with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Will we find the Naml here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Stay out! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
I have found a seedbed.
Time to secure it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: No! Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: They're being attacked!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Best to wait and watch.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: I'll save ye!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: They've been taken away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: We just have a question abou—

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
Wait. Ye wouldn't happen to know anything
about my heart, would... Nae, I suppose not.
Apologies for the trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
An interference.
We must retreat for now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Are ye all right there?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: You saved me! You are amazing!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
Ye wouldn't happen to know why people
cannae catch worms anymore, would ye?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
We can't catch worms.
We are in trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
Right, exactly. But do you know
anything MORE than that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
We are in trouble!
We are in trouble!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
That's the Bashar colony—a people primitive
and violent to the last. Nothing good ever
comes of dealing with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Will we find the Dufda here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Stay out! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
I'm gonna make you feed
for my toys!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: No! Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: They're being attacked!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Best to wait and watch.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: I'll save ye!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: They've been taken away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: We just have a question abou—

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Wait. Ye wouldn't happen to know anything
about my heart, would... Nae, I suppose not.
Apologies for the trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Ugh, stop bothering me!
Fiiine, I'll go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Are ye all right there?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: You saved me! You are amazing!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Ye wouldn't happen to know why people
cannae catch worms anymore, would ye?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
We can't catch worms.
We are in trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Right, exactly. But do you know
anything MORE than that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
We are in trouble!
We are in trouble!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.text:
This must be one of the keystones.
Let's give it a proper shove!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.text:
I can handle this if I temporarily unleash
my full power. Leave it to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.text:
Wait, look at the keystone!
The relief is moving!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
Well, that was a surprise.
What WAS that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
The Lord of the Earth's power is clearly so
grand that whoever made this seal thought
it needed extra security measures.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
So we have to do it again?
Ugh. Talk about annoying.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.text:
I bet those reliefs are
gonna attack us again.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.text: Should I do this on my own?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.text: Look! The relief is moving again!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.text:
Now we've moved both keystones,
which should be enough to wake
the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.text: Came from over there. Let's go!

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Your stones. So many stones.
Will you give them to me?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Perhaps they are mere stones to you,
but they are necessities to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, I suppose I don't see the harm,
since ye seem so keen to have them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, what fine stones! Please accept
this small token of my thanks.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text:
You have collected more stones.
Give them to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text:
I've no data indicating moles eat rocks.
What do ye intend to use them for?

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text: You will find out soon enough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
You have collected more stones.
Give them to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text: So many... Perhaps this is enough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
I have been exposed to the elements
this whole time, but now I can
finally rest in peace.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
You have been a great help to me.
But now, farewell.

SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_W08_EVAR_DIVA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
Perhaps it was a ghost of some kind?
I cannae be certain.
